segments.text: Steven , it's ten o'clock . I'm going to bed . I'm beat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I'm going to stay up a while . I've got to go over the household budget . We've sightly overspent this month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , can't you do it tomorrow ? It's already past 10 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I'm not sleepy , darling . I want to finish it today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Please close the door to the basement before you go to bed . I don't want the dog down there tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Good night . Have a good dream .
segments.speaker: S2
